Type Definitions

options

Properties:
Name Type Argument Default Description
serviceName string <optional>
 <name from package.json>

The name of this service.
serviceVersion string <optional>
 <version from package.json>

The version of this service.
descriptorSetPath string <optional>
 "user-function.desc"

A path to a compiled Protobuf FileDescriptor set, as output by protoc --descriptor_set_out=somefile.desc. This file must contain all of the entity services that this user function serves.
